item.title: TSM
item.description: score:10 Chances: TSM’s chips are widely used in various industries including personal computers, information applications, wired and wireless communications, automotive and industrial equipment, and consumer electronics. TSM is receiving significant subsidies from Japan to build a second chip fabrication plant, indicating strong support and potential growth opportunities in the semiconductor market.
